review.summary: Simple version information module for neo-commons package. Contains version string and tuple following standard Python packaging conventions. Code is minimal, clean, and follows established patterns for version management.

positive_observations.observation: Follows standard Python packaging conventions with __version__ and __version_info__
Includes proper module docstring explaining purpose
Uses semantic versioning (1.0.0) following industry standards
Provides both string and tuple formats for different use cases
Minimal, focused implementation with no unnecessary complexity

context.tests: No tests needed for simple version constants
context.documentation: Module docstring is present and appropriate
context.configuration: Standard version file pattern for Python packages
